venicehub

Class RPCServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • venicehub.RPCServer

  • public class RPCServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a RPCServer and receives commands, which are then forwarded to VeniceHub.

    Connection information is taken from Configuration.
    The RPCServer is used only when VeniceHub is replaying data from disk.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RPCServer()
      Constructor without parameter.

      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RPCServer

        public RPCServer()
        Constructor without parameter. Just calls the Constructor with parameter using null a the parameter.

      • RPCServer

        public RPCServer(VeniceHub veniceHub)
        Constructor. Creates the RPC server.

        Needs a reference to VeniceHub, so it can call the methods for play, pause and seek.

        Parameters:
        veniceHub - A reference to VeniceHub.
